entry.title: House in the countryside 3 bedrooms Valinhos Aljezur - equipped kitchen, garden, barbecue (Provenda)
entry.content:
€ 560.000
House in the countryside 3 bedrooms Valinhos Aljezur - equipped kitchen, garden, barbecue
prev
next
190m²  1.500m²REF PV-T-590

Sale
T3 housing of traditional construction in mud, rehabilitated and in good condition. Fully furnished and ready to live, it is very close to the city center. Just 15 minutes from the beach, it offers the perfect balance between country life and access to all urban amenities. It has three bedrooms with private bathroom plus an additional supporting house, living room and kitchen equipped in open plane, pantry and tidy living room, garden, porch, barbecue, fruit trees, 4 garages, two holes, connection to the water network and electricity.

entry.title: Farm Aljezur - cork oaks, arable crop, water (Provenda)
entry.content:
€ 420.000
Farm Aljezur - cork oaks, arable crop, water
prev
next
120m²  31.620m²REF PV-T-589

Sale
3.16 hectare property located 3 km from the center of Aljezur and 7 km from the beaches. It has a construction area of 120sqm corresponding to an old house for reconstruction, classified as a legal ruin, thus offering several possibilities for renovation. The land is of mixed nature, with areas of arable culture and cork oaks. It has easy road access, connection to the electricity grid and on-site water supply. Ideal for those who want to develop a residential project, in an area with great potential.

entry.title: Hotel Aljezur - laundry (Provenda)
entry.content:
€ 550.000
Hotel Aljezur - laundry
prev
next
78.000m²REF T-584

Sale
Located in a beautiful area with easy access, approximately 8 km from Aljezur, this property is ideal for a nature retreat. It has prior approval for the construction of a resort-style hotel with dispersed units, comprising: 20 buildings, of which 15 are accommodation units/houses with a total area of ​​675sqm (45sqm/unit); 3 buildings for staff accommodation with a total area of ​​120sqm; 1 building for common areas and services with 400sqm; 1 building for laundry, technical area and storage with 150sqm. The project also includes a biological swimming pool, solar park and parking. Areas can be adjusted according to a new plan. The property has a wide variety of trees. Water is supplied via the public network and a borehole, and electricity and telecommunications are located close to the property. It is approximately 15 minutes from the beaches of Vale dos Homens and Amoreira, a 40-minute drive from Palmares Golf Course and approximately 90 minutes by car from Faro Airport.
Add to Favorites
Schedule a Visit More information

Access to local shops is convenient, as the market, bakeries, cafes, restaurants, banks and other essential amenities are just a few steps away. The house is just 10 minutes from the region's beautiful beaches, 30 minutes from the Lakes and 90 minutes from Faro Airport. Schedule your visit now!

entry.title: Town house in the historic zone of Aljezur (SW-Places)
entry.content:
Highlight
Exclusive

Town house in the historic zone of Aljezur

Aljezur, Faro

In Aljezur, on the slopes of the Castle we find this property with 92m2. Comprising living room, kitchen, 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Structurally rammed earth house already has recent improvement and insulation of the roof.
House in habitable conditions although in need of rehabilitation of some areas. It has two independent entrances and accessible by car, it has the typical and characteristic streets of the place, it provides a wonderful view over the village and floodplain, usually with sunny mornings and afternoons. 
Are you interested in the area?
Then you can't miss the opportunity to visit this house.
Book your visit now

entry.title: One-Of-A-Kind Ocean View Plot with up to 4000m2 Building Rights (SW-Places)
entry.content:
Highlight
Exclusive

One-Of-A-Kind Ocean View Plot with up to 4000m2 Building Rights

Aljezur, Faro

32 hectares of gorgeous and peaceful land situated just 10 minutes to Aljezur, 10

minutes to Rogil and 12 minutes to wild Costa Vicentina beaches. The property is a rare

mix of flat areas, rolling hills, dense forests and open plains with panoramic views of the

Atlantic ocean and Monchique mountains. The property is accessed via a quiet, freshly

paved road.

The property offers enormous development potential with a rare 4,000 square meters of

development rights, ideal for a tourism project, retreat center or private family estate.

Additionally, the property is uniquely suitable for horse enthusiasts.

Development rights consist of the following:

- On one part (24 hectares) you can build up to 2000m2 for a rural tourism project

or a single-family house up to 300m2. This parcel would be ideal for horse

enthusiasts boasting highly suitable areas for equestrian facilities and easy

access to the many walking and riding trails running through the area.

- On the other adjacent part of the property (8 hectares) you can also build up to

2000m2 for a rural tourism project or a single-family house of up to 300m2.

Alternatively this parcel may be split and sold if you don't need as much land and building rights for your project.

This is a nature-lover's dream with connected hiking, biking, walking and horse riding

trails as well as secluded forests and fabulous surf beaches nearby. From the property

you only see the ocean, mountains and fields and hear the sound of birds and wind. It is

hard to believe it is so close to all local amenities.

Electricity and public water is on site.

Our well-versed team of experts are available to discuss land rights, contractors,

architects etc. to build your dream space.

Book your visit today

 

€ 1 650 000

entry.title: House to restore in Aljezur centre (SW-Places)
entry.content:
Exclusive

House to restore in Aljezur centre

Aljezur, Faro

Charming Portuguese Property in the Heart of Aljezur’s Old Town Located in a prime location, just 2 minutes from the bus station, this exceptional property sits at the crossroads of Aljezur’s historic old town and the scenic new town, overlooking the Aljezur River. The property features: Two spacious houses with a total built area of 92m², with potential for expansion. A private 82m² garden, perfect for relaxation or development. A 31m² ruin with authorization to build a two-story structure, seamlessly integrated with the existing property. With the possibility to divide the property into four separate units, this unique offering is ideal for a boutique hotel, guesthouse, or private residence. Don’t miss this rare opportunity to own a piece of Aljezur’s rich history in a sought-after location. Schedule your visit today!

  • 2 Bedrooms
  • 1 Kitchens
  • 1 WCs

€ 350 000

entry.title: Fabulosa quinta (SW-Places)
entry.content:
For Sale

Fabulosa quinta

Aljezur, Faro

Fabulous property comprising 3 properties.
The first property is a mixed plot of land with a 414 m2 villa set in a 1.4 ha plot consisting mainly of cork oaks. The villa has very generous areas, with 4 en-suite bedrooms, a large lounge and living area, a dining room and an equipped kitchen, as well as a small apartment with an independent entrance. The villa has several extras such as good thermal insulation, double-glazed wooden windows, walls and underfloor heating, with solar panels and also supported by a wood-burning stove.
It has mains water and two boreholes, one 90 meters long and the other 15 meters long, which supports the stable area.
Cistern with capacity for 12 m3 and another with 8 m3.
Alarm, air conditioning in all rooms, internet connection via fiber, central fire station.
Outside there is a leisure area with a swimming pool with heated water, heated by solar panels.
The second property is a rustic plot of 9000 m2 where the stables are located, made up of cork oaks and native vegetation.

The third property is a mixed building with an uncovered area of 5000 m2 and a 150 m2 villa.

It has 3 bedrooms, one of which is en-suite, 2 bathrooms, an equipped kitchen, 2 living rooms, 1 dining area.

Central heating. Outside there is a garden with a small lake.
Vale Figueiras beach is just a 10-minute drive away, the town of Aljezur is 10 minutes away and Lagos is 20 minutes away.
Book your vist

  • 7 Bedrooms
  • 2 Kitchens
  • 7 WCs

€ 2 500 000

entry.title: Land by the EN120 with business and mobile home (SW-Places)
entry.content:
Exclusive

Land by the EN120 with business and mobile home

Aljezur, Faro

Rustic Land in Southwest Alentejo and Vicentine Coast Natural Park An exceptional opportunity to own 6.55 hectares of land within the Southwest Alentejo and Vicentine Coast Natural Park, ideally located adjacent to National Road 120. This property is equipped with infrastructure and facilities ready to support a range of ventures, from artisanal markets to agricultural projects. 

 Property Features:

Structures and Facilities: A two-bedroom mobile home (80 m²) with mains electricity, water from an on-site well, and a septic tank for sanitation. Multiple mobile structures, currently supporting a handicraft business with space for further activities. 

Land and Resources: 6.55 hectares of versatile land, surrounded by the natural beauty of the protected park. Water access from a well, offering ample supply for irrigation or other needs. 

Accessibility and Location: Conveniently situated next to National Road 120, combining easy access with the tranquility of a natural park setting. This property is a rare find for anyone looking to establish a creative business, agricultural enterprise, or simply enjoy the untouched beauty of this unique region. 

 Contact us today to learn more or arrange a viewing!

€ 290 000

entry.title: 10 Hectares of Pristine Nature – Just 5 Minutes from Aljezur (SW-Places)
entry.content:
Exclusive

10 Hectares of Pristine Nature – Just 5 Minutes from Aljezur

Aljezur, Faro

 

A rare opportunity to own a stunning piece of untouched nature, with panoramic views and total tranquility, yet only 5 minutes from the heart of Aljezur. Perfect for building your dream home, a private retreat, or a rural tourism project.

This 10-hectare property is covered with original vegetation, including pine trees, cork oaks, and medronhos. The buildable area offers breathtaking, elevated views over the are to the south of Aljezur and surrounding landscapes. Beyond the development zone, the land provides ample space to create peaceful, private spots to unwind, immerse yourself in nature, and enjoy the serene vistas.

A natural waterline runs through the property, while easy access is provided by a well-maintained road that reaches the land.

Building Rights:

Family home up to 300m²
Rural tourism project up to 2,000m²
This is an ideal location for those seeking total peace and nature, with the added benefit of being just a short drive from Aljezur and the stunning attractions of the Algarve region.

Don’t miss the chance to see this rare gem. Book your viewing today!
 

€ 445 000
